ing.item: Bread slices; crusts removed, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (up to 4)

directions.step:
Chicago Tribune
Preparation time: 5 minutes Cooking time: 10-15 minutes Yield: 4 servings
1. Heat oven to 300 degrees. Combine melted butter and garlic in large bowl. Add bread cubes; stir gently to coat. Place bread on baking sheet in single layer. Bake, turning once during baking, until bread is golden on all sides, 10 to 15 minutes. Let croutons cool. Store in airtight container.
